name: Morph Ranger
description:
You are a newly born morph ranger. Get DNA samples to upgrade yourself and your movability.

This game was made in under 48 hours for the 35th ludum dare with the theme 'Shapeshift'.#ldjam #ld35
Ludum Dare Link: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=preview&uid=20306
